summary: How Brie helps you prepare for a role:
body:
How Brie helps you prepare for a role:

  • You and Brie have been together for quite a while, before all the Marvel involvement.
  • She knows your methods of preparation inside and out, but once you to got together, things changed.
  • She noticed you slipping up in line running or stuttering during film and she wasn’t going to see you struggle like this when you already where an acclaimed Academy Award winner and hold the the coveted title as an EGOT winner, so she came up with two methods-
  • (1) she denies you of sex. 1 slip = 1 day. You almost racked up two months in one week, but it was forgiven on the 6th day because you performed a perfect run through of your choreography for when you where in Sweeney Todd on broadway.
  • Or (2) she gets you on your knees, cuffs you to the bed and places your script on your back. Every time you mess up you get spanked. Every perfect line, she edges you.
  • She will read the line before, racking her nails down your body, taking her time to get every word out.
  • “You know, you made quite an impression today young lady, that was very brave of you…”
  • “I had no choice either I stand-“ you where cut off by your on gasp as Brie’s hand connected with your ass.
  • “I don’t quite think that’s right kitten, looks like you’ll have to do that again,” she would growl in your ear as she would massage your ass.
  • “I had no choice, I either let him fall or I stand up, open my eyes and catch him,” you puffed out.
  • “Look at that, maybe you do know what your lines are,” as she starts drawing her fingers in and out of your cunt at a fast pace, getting you as close as she possibly can and then pulling out at last minute, “if we can get through this scene, I’m gonna fuck you into the bed.”
  • And she keeps her promise, uncuffing you, flipping you over and giving you The Strap™️.
  • Call her Ms. Flintstone because she makes the bed ROCK.
  • You are literally shaking by the end because of all the stimulation and Brie can’t get enough of it.
  • When you both finish she lays down beside you and kisses your shoulder.
  • “Get some rest. You have a stunt scene tomorrow and because you refuse to get a double I want you to be on the f not the e.”

summary: could you please elaboreate what both ariana and brie are doing which leads to praise on one and shaming on the other side, and...
question: could you please elaboreate what both ariana and brie are doing which leads to praise on one and shaming on the other side, and since when is ariana a confirmed wlw? I'm sorry, I'm a bit confused
answer:
hey nonnie!

ariana released a song called monopoly with victoria monet, featuring explicit lyrics that include being into both genders. ariana then confirmed on her twitter that she never preferred labels and agreed that what she said in the song is true.

people ever since the buwyg music video bashed ariana for “queer-baiting”, when she’s an actual wlw. but then brie larson admits to enjoying that she likes stealing girls or something during interviews/is treated as a gay icon and ppl swoon.

and brie could be a wlw, but my point is that she’s doing the same thing basically that ariana was criticized for doing and it was unfair, especially since brie has never spoken ab her sexuality like ariana yet brie was raised on a pedestal instead.

(also i couldn’t tell if ur tone was passive-aggressive or not, but i was trying my best to not sound rude).

summary: These are the first news articles that pop up when you google Brie Larson’s name. Honestly this has got to stop.  Brie has said...
caption: These are the first news articles that pop up when you google Brie Larson’s name. Honestly this has got to stop.  Brie has said again and again that she is an introvert and doesn’t really like doing press tours and focusing on herself. She prefers talking about her characters or using the tours as an oppurtunity to educate and help people. And if you’ve watched ANY interviews of her you’d know she ALWAYS has posture that would make a Victorian ettiquette master weep with joy.
